ghost.banshee.name: Banshee
ghost.banshee.strength: Only targets one player at a time.
ghost.banshee.weakness: Crucifix radius is extended up to 5m.
ghost.demon.name: Demon
ghost.demon.weakness: Using right Ouija board questions does not drain sanity.
ghost.jinn.name: Jinn
ghost.jinn.strength: Moves faster the further away you are from it.
ghost.jinn.weakness: Cutting off the location’s power supply will limit the Jinn’s speed.
ghost.mare.name: Mare
ghost.mare.strength: Attacks more frequently in the dark, tends to switch off lights.
ghost.mare.weakness: More passive when lights are on.
ghost.oni.name: Oni
ghost.oni.strength: Activity depends on number of players close to it.
ghost.oni.weakness: Easy to find when players move in group.
ghost.phantom.name: Phantom
ghost.phantom.strength: Looking at the Phantom will reduce your sanity more quickly.
ghost.phantom.weakness: Capturing a photo will cause it to disappear, not during a hunt.
ghost.poltergeist.name: Poltergeist
ghost.poltergeist.strength: Actively interacts with environment, what decreases sanity faster.
ghost.poltergeist.weakness: Helpless in rooms without throwable objects. Can be easily identified by lots of flying objects.
ghost.revenant.name: Revenant
ghost.revenant.weakness: Moves 2x slower when no one in sight.
ghost.shade.name: Shade
ghost.shade.strength: Minimal activity if players are in group, hard to find and detect.
ghost.shade.weakness: Won't not hunt if several players are in it's room.
ghost.spirit.name: Spirit
ghost.spirit.weakness: Using smudge sticks prevent hunting for 5 minutes.
ghost.wraith.name: Wraith
ghost.wraith.strength: Footprint sounds from a Wraith will be rare to non-existent, and stepping in Salt will be less likely.
ghost.wraith.weakness: Touching salt will increase it's activity.
ghost.yurei.name: Yurei
ghost.yurei.weakness: Smudge stick in the same room will stop the Yurei from moving for 90 seconds.
ghost.yokai.name: Yokai
ghost.yokai.strength: Talking near a Yokai will anger it and increase it's chance of attacking.
ghost.yokai.weakness: When hunting a Yokai can only hear voices close to it.
ghost.hantu.name: Hantu
ghost.goryo.name: Goryo
ghost.goryo.strength: Shows itself only if there are no people nearby. Can be seen on D.O.T.S. only through camera.
ghost.myling.name: Myling
ghost.myling.strength: A Myling is known to be quieter when hunting.
ghost.onryo.name: Onryo
ghost.onryo.strength: Extinguishing a flame can cause an Onryo to attack.
ghost.onryo.weakness: When threatened, this ghost will be less likely to hunt.
ghost.twins.name: The Twins
ghost.twins.strength: Either Twin can be angered and initiate an attack on their prey.
ghost.twins.weakness: The Twins will often interact with the environment at the same time.
ghost.obake.name: Obake
ghost.obake.strength: Rarely leaves a trace when interacting with the environment.
ghost.raiju.name: Raiju
question.radio.aggression.3: Do you want to hurt us?
question.radio.aggression.8: Do you want us to leave?
question.radio.location.5: Let us know you are here.
question.radio.misc.3: What do you want to eat?
question.radio.misc.4: Do you want to build a snowman?
question.radio.misc.5: Do you want a bro job?
question.ouija.victim.3: What is the name of the person you killed?
question.ouija.victim.4: What is the name of the person you murdered?
question.ouija.death.1: How long have you been dead?
question.ouija.death.2: How many years ago did you die?
question.ouija.death.3: How long have you been here?
question.ouija.death.4: How long ago did you die?
question.ouija.room.1: How many are in this room?
question.ouija.room.2: How many people are in this room?
question.ouija.room.4: How many ghosts are in this room?
